name: Shamrock
aura: Increase Ally ACC in in all Battles by 70

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times.  Each hit has a 60% chance of removing 1 random buff from the target. If a buff is removed, has a 35% of stealing that buff.
skills.name: Luck Swap
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.desc:
Places a 60% [Increase DEF] buff on all allies for 2 turns. Places a 30% [Increase SPD] buff on all allies with more than 50% HP for 2 turns. Also has a 50% chance of placing a 30% [Increase C. RATE] buff on those allies for 2 turns.

Places a [Revive On Death] buff on all allies with less than 50% HP for 2 turns. Also has a 50% chance of placing a 15% [Continuous Heal] buff on those allies for 2 turns.
skills.name: Lucky Charms
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.desc:
Places a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff on all enemies for 2 turns. Decreases the Turn Meter of all enemies by 15%.

Fills the Turn Meters of all allies by 15% if any enemy's Turn Meter is below 50%.
skills.name: Uncatchable
